lead_paragraph: The military situation on the Russian front appears to have reached a state of critical balance. German admissions as well as Russian claims confirm this view. A balance of this kind cannot be maintained indefinitely. Some degree of movement must be restored as the initiative passes to one side or the other.
abstract: ed on German halt in USSR
